Title: Azure Cost Estimation: Your Strategic Guide to Cloud Pricing
Description:
In this episode of the Azure Essentials Show, Thomas once again welcomes Britt from Microsoft Azure to tackle the common challenge of understanding and estimating cloud costs. Many users find Azure pricing complex and unpredictable, making it difficult to plan and optimize spending. This episode introduces a practical three-layer framework and essential tools that empower viewers to take control of their Azure pricing journey, moving from confusion to confidence in cost estimation and management.

Three Things You Will Learn
- How to use the Azure Pricing Calculator and other tools to estimate and manage cloud costs effectively.
- A three-layer framework for approaching Azure pricing: architecture, configuration, and usage estimation.
- Ways to leverage Azure Advisor, Cost Management, and Copilot to optimize spending and refine estimates over time.
